snippet: Mike McGinn, who was elected mayor in 2009, was denied a second term on Tuesday as voters turned instead to Ed Murray, a longtime state senator.
abstract: Seattle voters deny incumbent Mayor Mike McGinn a second term and instead turn to longtime State Senator Ed Murray; it is third time in 12 years that city's voters have ousted sitting mayor.
lead_paragraph: Mike McGinn, who was elected mayor in 2009, was denied a second term on Tuesday as voters turned instead to Ed Murray, a longtime state senator.

headline.main: A Familiar Result in Seattle, as Voters Oust Mayor for the Third Time in 12 Years
headline.print_headline:
Seattle Voters Oust Mayor
For Third Time in 12 Years

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
